author: jannik031153
content: Is there documentation about how clients (in particular Geth, but curious about others as well) handle the tx pool? Like if a new transaction is received, how is it decided if it gets added to the pool or not, and if the pool is full which transaction is dropped in exchange?

author: jannik031153
content: also happy to dig through the code myself if anyone could point me to the right place to start at
